title: Billed Cap
description:
A plain soft hat with a rounded crown and a stiff bill. Most often shown in a shade of blue and displayed at an angle to clearly display its outwards- protruding bill.

Regularly associated with the slang term "capping", meaning "lying". Responding to a message with a single ðŸ§¢ emoji is viewable as an accusation of lying (“cap”) while stating "no ðŸ§¢" ("no cap") is intended to emphasize the truthfulness of a statement.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's billed cap emoji is a sleek, stylish accessory rendered with exceptional attention to detail, featuring a prominent brim and a rounded crown that appears to be made of a smooth, matte fabric. On Apple devices, the realistic lighting and subtle shading create a convincing sense of dimension, highlighting the soft rounded edges of the capâ€™s form. Whether used to signify casual style, outdoor activities, or a sense of laid-back confidence, this emoji, with its clean lines and understated elegance, embodies the sophisticated design language found across Apple products.
